languages.text: "Он был безумным стариком, что лгал тебе и использовал. Не сожалей о нем".

traits.locale_text: "Он был безумным стариком, что лгал тебе и использовал. Не сожалей о свершенном".

languages.text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."
languages.original_text: "Он был безумным стариком, что лгал тебе и использовал. Не сожалей о нем".

traits.locale_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Don't feel sorry for him."
"He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Don't feel sorry for him."
"He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."
"He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."
"He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."
"He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

languages.text: « Ce n'était qu'un vieillard dément. Il vous a dupée et manipulée à cœur joie. Il ne mérite pas votre sympathie. »
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était qu'un vieillard dément. Il vous a dupée et manipulée à cœur joie. Il ne mérite pas votre sympathie. »

languages.text: «Era un viejo demente que le mintió y utilizó. No se sienta mal por él».
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

traits.locale_text: «Era un viejo demente que le mintió y utilizó. No se sienta mal por él».

languages.text: 「彼は君に嘘をついて利用した狂気じみた年寄りだ。悪く思うことはない」
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は君に嘘をついて利用した狂気じみた年寄りだ。悪く思うことはない」

languages.text: “他不过是个老疯子而已。他欺骗你，利用你，你根本用不着为他感到难过。”
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

traits.locale_text: “他不过是个老疯子而已。他欺骗你，利用你，你根本用不着为他感到难过。”

languages.text: "Er war ein verrückter Greis, der Euch belogen und ausgenutzt hat. Habt kein Mitleid mit ihm."
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."

traits.locale_text: "Er war ein verrückter Greis, der Euch belogen und ausgenutzt hat. Habt kein Mitleid mit ihm."

languages.text: "Sana yalan söyleyip seni kullanan, deli ihtiyarın tekiydi. Onun için üzülme."
languages.original_text: "He was a crazed old man who lied to you and used you. Do not feel sorry for him."
